title: The Grieving Widow
location: North Ward -> The Quiet Homes District
description: A woman named Sera has been spending her entire weekly wage on Void-Wine from a house operation nearby. Her adult daughter Lena begs you to help her mother before the addiction takes the family's savings completely.

turns.narrative: You meet Lena at the door of a tidy but exhausted-looking home. Sera is inside, glassy-eyed and serene, turning a tiny bottle in her fingers. She lost her husband to the Scourge six months ago. The wine makes her feel him near her still.
turns.choice_a: Speak directly to Sera about the addiction and her financial situation
turns.consequence_a: Sera listens without anger. She admits she knows it's expensive but says the emptiness without it is unbearable.
turns.choice_b: First trace where Sera is buying the wine before engaging with her
turns.consequence_b: Lena shows you a house three streets over. Dealer Gant sells small doses from a locked parlour.

turns.narrative: Gant's parlour operation is not violent — he sells carefully and in small doses to ensure repeat customers. But his pricing is exploitative of grieving, vulnerable citizens.
turns.choice_a: Confront Gant and threaten to report him if he keeps selling to Sera
turns.consequence_a: Gant is coldly pragmatic. He agrees to cut Sera off because losing a customer to legal trouble isn't worth it.
turns.choice_b: Report Gant to the Ward Warden with documentation of his clientele
turns.consequence_b: Warden Astrid sends inspectors. Gant's operation is shut down permanently.

turns.narrative: With Gant's supply cut or shut, Sera must face her grief without chemical help.
turns.choice_a: Connect Sera with a grief counsellor at the Temple District
turns.consequence_a: Sera resists initially but agrees to try. Lena is deeply grateful.
turns.choice_b: Simply support Lena as her mother goes through withdrawal — providing comfort items and company
turns.consequence_b: You spend three evenings with the family. Sera comes through it shakily but with her savings mostly intact.

sera_helped.description: Sera connected with grief counselling. Supply cut.

family_supported.description: You personally helped the family through withdrawal.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Sera connected with grief counselling. Supply cut.
